title: #93: Kirk Nurmi and the Defense of Jodi Arias
description:
The RCP Team (Jim Clemente, Laura Richards and Lisa Zambetti) welcome author and former defense attorney Kirk Nurmi to the show. He discusses his strained relationship with defendant Jodi Arias in the trial for the murder of Travis Alexander, a case that became a media circus.
